Greetings

My name is Nick Stanley, and I'm a Platform Engineer specializing in DevOps, site reliability, and security & compliance automation. This website is a space to improve my writing and curate my knowledge portfolio. Here, you'll find my blog posts, projects, book notes, and my resume and manifesto.
